h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle
content: He can quickly charge at you in a lunging backhanded slice attack, which will result in a whirlwind of blade strikes all around him after a moment you'll also need to dodge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle'.
The content is as follows:
He can quickly charge at you in a lunging backhanded slice attack, which will result in a whirlwind of blade strikes all around him after a moment you'll also need to dodge.
